Entries.90629100/e 9062999/O Caroline/F: libraryTheme/15 10/farmer 5 10 0 Gunther 5 8 2/skippable/pause 500/speak Gunther "So... Evelyn gave you this seed, hmm?"/pause 500/speak Gunther "Lemme see..."/animate Gunther false true 500 2 3/pause 1500/speak Gunther "Hmm...#$b#A very old seed...#$b#I don't think this one is even plantable..."/emote farmer 16/question null "#Is there any other way?"/stopAnimation Gunther/pause 800/speak Gunther "I was kidding.#$b#The seed is actually quite recent after all.#$b#Even if it were an ancient one, we could bring it back to life, one way or another."/speak Gunther "It's been years since the initial breakthrough in fossil resurrection technology.#$b#But I suppose Evelyn has never been much of a tech person, has she?#$b#Anyway, wait here."/fade 0.07 true/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/viewport 15 10/pause 1500/speak Gunther "I got a good news and a bad news for you."/speak Gunther "I could send it to Ferngill Republic National Research Lab, the results are far more promising there since the most advanced techniques could been used.#$b#However, given the rarity of this seed, there's a possibility they may choose to keep the seed in their pocket instead of reintroduce it back to wild.#$b#If that happens, you would never see it again.#$b#I can use my homemade Seed Machine, which will allow you to plant and experiment them yourself.#$b#The problem is that it was originally from a different region.#$b#Even if I could, modify the genetic structure of the seed requires many months of work."/emote Gunter 16/pause 1000/speak Gunther "I know what you're thinking...they can adapt, yes. But not here.#$b#You should know that our valley does have some 'weird' weather phenomenas.#$b#The green, mushy rain, for example.#$b#As a result, replicants from the original seed can not be grow anywhere around the Valley.#$b#You'd have to find a place outside the valley with a more pleasant pattern so that adaptation can slowly occur.#$b#...which is, in fact, costly, and uneffiecient. If you're"/message "Gunther frowned as he spoke."/pause 800/question null "#I don't want to give up on this.#It's a special one, to me, to Evelyn and Caroline. It's risky and I don't want that.#I can live with it, money isn't a problem."/emote Gunther 32/pause 1000/speak Gunther "Although I don't get the position to judge you here, but I trust that you chose the right decision, @.#$b#...truth be told, after that incident, I doubt those scientists would care if the seed had any meaning to us at all...#$b#Ah, never mind it."/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Gunther "You should go back to work, farmer.#$b#I'll take care the seed."/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Gunther "By the way, you're able to find a place like that, let me know.#$b#If you don't, Lewis should be able to help you with that."/removeQuest Caroline12HeartsQuestPart1/addQuest Caroline12HeartsQuestPart2/message "Your quest log has been updated."/end warpOut

Entries.90629101/e 90629100/O Caroline/F/p Lewis: fall2/12 6/farmer 1000 -1000 0 Lewis 8 5 2 Caroline 1000 -1000/skippable/removeQuest Caroline12HeartsQuestPart2/addQuest Caroline12HeartsQuestPart3/warp farmer 5 11/playSound doorClose/textAboveHead Lewis "Greeting!"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -3 right/pause 300/move Lewis 0 3 left/pause 500/speak Lewis "What's bring you to my house today?$h"/emote farmer 40/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 4 8/faceDirection farmer left true/warp Lewis 2 8/faceDirection Lewis right true/pause 500/message "You told Lewis about the situation."/pause 1000/viewport 12 6/frienship Caroline 15/friendship Lewis 15/friendship Evelyn 15/speak Lewis "Interesting...#$b#So what exactly why you need to do this?"/question null "#For Evelyn.#For Caroline.#Hmm... for science?"/speak Lewis "Hmmm..."/speak Lewis "Well, I happened to know a place like that, and it not very far from here actually.#$b#I bought it from a friend many years ago.#$b#He was desperated for money, said he had been involved into something shady bussinesses that caught up to his sleeves...#$b#Anyway, it has been there a long while but I didn't what to do with it,so...$h#$b#5,000 gold should be the final price.$h#$b#And no more expense after that."/quickQuestion #Sounds good, 5,000 gold is fairly reasonable.#Well, can you make it about 3,000? I'm a bit short of money right now.(break)friendship Lewis 15(break)friendship Lewis -15\speak Lewis "I understood where you're coming from, but with my deepest respect, I cannot help you with that, @.$s#$b#The government requires us to pay a hefty amount of that porpotion to combat the desertification around the area.#$b#Looking at how dangerous the Calico Desert, I think it's really worth the pay.#$b#...If they ever keep their promise about it, that is.$s"\emote farmer 28\switchEvent 90629101_CarolineBargeIn/end warpOut
Entries.90629101_CarolineBargeIn: playSound doorClose/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/warp Caroline 5 11/faceDirection Lewis 2 true/textAboveHead Lewis "Caroline?"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer//pause/speak Caroline "I'll pay."/pause 1000/fade 0.07 true/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Lewis 1000 1000/warp farmer 1000 1000/warp Caroline 1000 1000/changeLocation Town/viewport 55 89/faceDirection Caroline 2/warp Caroline/speak Caroline "@, I should have known after you came home that day. You spent your time doing all of this behind my back, didn't you!?$3"/quickQuestion What would you say?#Caroline, you don't need to pay for anything, really. I have enough gold for it.#I'm sorry, Evelyn said that you would love a small surprise.(break)friendship Caroline -15(break)friendship Caroline 15/speak Caroline "But @,... I don't like being lied to, you know that?$s#$b#Everyone lied to me.$s#$b#Pierre lied to keep me out of his troubles, his bussinesses, and Abigail lied to me because she didn't want me to interfere her life, or worry about her.#$b#They thought that would it protect me from that dangerous world they lived in themselves...#$b#But... the way they treated me made me felt I was nothing but a nonsensical mother, an unsupportive wife, and a fool.$s#$b#...$a#$b#Forgive me, I shouldn't have brought that up upon you, @. I didn't mean to be overreacting like that.$s#$b#I... really need some time alone."/emote farmer 40/message "You realised something..."/message "Maybe, the gift that Evelyn said about wasn't the seed to begin with..."/pause 500/message "...It was about her dream."/message "You knew where she should be."/question null "Follow her."/move farmer 0 -1 2/speak Caroline "Darling, hello..$s"/pause 1000/question null "#'Caroline, do you want to do this together?'"/faceDirection Caroline 0/message "Caroline suprised by your offer."/speak Caroline "Uhm... did you ask me to... take care of the flower field for you?$0"/question null "#Yes. Will you accept it?#I couldn't think of anyone other than you."/message "Your quest log has been updated."/end
